mapper.select: /* PaymentDao.selectPaymentOne - 결제 1건 */ SELECT PAY_SN AS paySn , ORD_NO AS ordNo , ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , PAY_STATE AS payStateCd , TID AS tid , MID AS mid , GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , TIMESTAMP AS timestamp , SIGNATURE AS signature , VERIFICATION AS verification , CURRENCY AS currency , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , BUYER_NM AS buyerNm , BUYER_TEL AS buyerTel , BUYER_EMAIL AS buyerEmail , PAYMENT_STATUS AS paymentStatus , VACT_BANK_NAME AS vactBankName , PAY_DEVICE AS payDevice , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate FROM CLT_PAY_BASE WHERE 1=1 AND TID = #{tid};

/* PaymentDao.selectPaymentList - 결제 리스트 */ SELECT PAY_SN AS paySn , ORD_NO AS ordNo , ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo , ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , PAY_STATE AS payStateCd , TID AS tid , MID AS mid , GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , TIMESTAMP AS timestamp , SIGNATURE AS signature , VERIFICATION AS verification , CURRENCY AS currency , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , BUYER_NM AS buyerNm , BUYER_TEL AS buyerTel , BUYER_EMAIL AS buyerEmail , PAYMENT_STATUS AS paymentStatus , VACT_BANK_NAME AS vactBankName , PAY_DEVICE AS payDevice , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate , UPDT_DATE AS updtDate FROM CLT_PAY_BASE WHERE 1=1;

/* PaymentDao.ordNoSearch */ SELECT base.ORD_CLM_NO AS ordClmNo, dtl.ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn FROM CLT_ORD_BASE base JOIN CLT_ORD_DTL dtl ON base.ORD_CLM_NO = dtl.ORD_CLM_NO WHERE 1=1 AND base.ORD_NO = #{ordNo};

/* PaymentDao.selectPayDtlInfoOne - 결제 상세 1건 */ SELECT PAY_DTL_INFO_SEQ AS payDtlInfoSeq , PAY_SN AS paySn , ORD_NO AS ordNo , ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , PAYMETHOD AS paymethod , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate FROM CLT_PAY_DTL_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND TID = #{payDtlInfoSeq};

/* PaymentDao.selectPayDtlInfoList - 결제 상세 리스트 */ SELECT PAY_DTL_INFO_SEQ AS payDtlInfoSeq , PAY_SN AS paySn , ORD_NO AS ordNo , ORD_CLM_DTL_SN AS ordClmDtlSn , GOODS_NM AS goodsNm , GOODS_PRC AS goodsPrc , PAYMETHOD AS paymethod , RGST_DATE AS rgstDate FROM CLT_PAY_DTL_INFO WHERE 1=1;
